Name: March 7th
Desc: March 7th in a Xianzhou-styled outfit. A sword-wielding female martial artist.\nLearning swordplay from both Yunli and Yanqing, she is eager to create more beautiful memories on the Xianzhou.

1.Name: My Sword Stirs Starlight
1.Desc: When Shifu is on the field, increases March 7th's SPD by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

2.Name: Blade Dances on Waves' Fight
2.Desc: After Shifu uses Basic ATK or Skill to attack an enemy target, March 7th immediately launches a follow-up attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of March 7th's ATK to the primary target of this attack. Additionally, triggers the corresponding effect based on Shifu's Path and then gains <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> point(s) of Charge. If there is no primary target available to attack, then attacks a single random enemy instead. This effect can only trigger once per turn.

3.Name: Sharp Wit in Martial Might
3.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

4.Name: Being Fabulous Never Frights
4.Desc: At the start of the turn, regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

5.Name: Sword Delights, Sugar Blights
5.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

6.Name: Me, the Best Girl in Sight
6.Desc: After using Ultimate, increases the CRIT DMG dealt by the next Enhanced Basic ATK by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

122401.Name: My Sword Zaps Demons
122401.Desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of March 7th's ATK to a single target enemy and gains <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> point(s) of Charge.

122402.Name: Master, It's Tea Time!
122402.Desc:
Designates a single ally (excluding this unit) as Shifu and increases Shifu's SPD by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color>. Only the most recent target of March 7th's Skill is considered as Shifu.


Whenever using Basic ATK or dealing 1 hit of Enhanced Basic ATK's DMG, triggers the corresponding effect if Shifu with the specified Path is present on the field:

Erudition, Destruction, The Hunt: Deals <u>Additional DMG</u> (DMG Type based on Shifu's Combat Type) equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of March 7th's ATK.

Harmony, Nihility, Preservation, Abundance: Increases the Toughness Reduction of this instance of DMG by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

122403.Name: March 7th, the Apex Heroine
122403.Desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of March 7th's ATK to a single target enemy.\nIncreases the initial Hits Per Action of the next Enhanced Basic ATK by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> hits and increase the <u>fixed chance </u>of additionally dealing DMG by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

122404.Name: Master, I've Ascended!
122404.Desc: After Shifu uses an attack or Ultimate, March 7th gains up to 1 point of Charge each time.\nUpon reaching <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> or more points of Charge, March 7th immediately takes action and increases the DMG she deals by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. Her Basic ATK gets Enhanced, and her Skill cannot be used. After using Enhanced Basic ATK, consumes <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> point(s) of Charge. Charge is capped at <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> points.

122406.Name: Attack
122406.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

122407.Name: Feast in One Go
122407.Desc: If March 7th is on the team, she gains 1 point of Charge at the start of the next battle whenever an ally uses Technique, up to a max of <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> point(s).\nAfter using Technique, March 7th regenerates <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> Energy when the next battle starts.

122408.Name: Brows Be Smitten, Heart Be Bitten
122408.Desc: Initially, deals <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> hits, each causing Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of March 7th's ATK to a single target enemy. Whenever dealing the final hit, there is a <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> <u>fixed chance</u> to deal 1 additional hit of DMG, up to a max of <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> additional hit(s). Energy regenerated from using Enhanced Basic ATK does not increase with the number of hits.\nEnhanced Basic ATK cannot recover Skill Points.

1.PointDesc: When the battle starts, March 7th's action is Advanced Forward by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
March 7th can reduce the Toughness of enemies whose Weakness Type is the same as Shifu's Combat Type. When Breaking Weakness, triggers the Imaginary Weakness Break effect.
After using Enhanced Basic ATK, increases Shifu's CRIT DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> and Break Effect by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
